name: CO-SINEθ
description:
CO-SINEθ is a top-down shooter about a highly advanced weapon that suddenly appeared around the world. Its main mechanic consists in piloting the Orb. Each Orb is different and mastering each Orb's strength is the key to win game.

Features:

  • Minimalistic art style
  • Multiple Orb to choose from
  • Utilize each Orb's unique combat attributes
  • Multiple map to explore and master
